title: 1 Golden Visitor
subtitle: One morning, a golden butterfly lands on your windowsill... What do you do?

options.response: You bolt outside, but whoa—this little guy is fast! Your friend laughs, 'Chill! It’s not a race!'
You lean on the windowsill, just watching. Your friend whispers, 'It’s like a tiny golden dream…'
You stay put, making sure it’s okay first. Your friend nods, 'Smart move, we don’t wanna scare it!'
You reach out, wiggling your fingers like butterfly antennae. Your friend giggles, 'Think it wants to play tag?'

title: 2 A Friend in Need
subtitle: You see your friend sitting alone under a tree... What do you do?

options.response: You tackle-hug them! They laugh, 'Okay, okay, I feel better already!'
You bust out your silliest moves. Your friend snorts, 'Okay, that was ridiculous… but kinda amazing.'
You sit beside them without a word. After a moment, they smile. 'Thanks for just being here.'
You point to the butterfly. 'See that? Magic’s real.' Your friend sighs. 'Maybe you’re right…'

title: 3 The Glinting Mystery
subtitle: Something shiny is stuck in the tree roots... What’s your move?

options.response: You dig furiously! Your friend cheers, 'Go, go, go! You got this!'
You examine the area carefully. Your friend nods, 'Sherlock vibes. I respect it.'
You yell, 'Guys, check this out!' Your friend grins, 'Ooo, mystery time!'
You yank it out! Your friend gasps, 'Whoa, no hesitation. Respect.'

title: 4 The Key and the Paw Prints
subtitle: It’s a key! And paw prints nearby… What now?

options.response: You study the prints. 'Hmmm…' Your friend whispers, 'Detective mode activated!'
You bounce ahead, following the prints. Your friend laughs, 'Wait up, speedy!'
You gather the crew. 'We roll as a team!' Your friend fist-bumps you, 'Squad goals!'
You march ahead. Your friend salutes, 'Fearless leader reporting for duty!'

title: 5 The Vined Gate
subtitle: The paw prints lead to an old gate covered in vines… What do you do?

options.response: You scan the area. Your friend whispers, 'Good idea, what if it’s a magic trap?!'
You start yanking vines. Your friend helps, 'Jungle cleanup crew, let’s go!'
You study the lock. Your friend mutters, 'Bet it needs, like, secret words or something…'
You shake the key. Your friend giggles, 'Nice. Maybe it’s a dance-powered door?'

title: 6 The Hidden Garden
subtitle: The gate creaks open to a secret garden! But… rustling sounds?

options.response: You hold up a stick like a sword. Your friend whispers, 'Protect the garden at all costs!'
You crouch and whisper, 'We’re in a stealth mission!' Your friend grins, 'Operation: Fun Mode activated!'
You push aside branches. Your friend helps, 'No obstacle shall stop us!'
You motion to stay close. Your friend nods, 'Yeah, I’m not getting lost in some magic garden!'

title: 7 The Fountain’s Secret
subtitle: Something’s shining at the bottom of an old fountain… What’s the plan?

options.response: You splash in without a thought! Your friend gasps, 'No hesitation! Absolute legend!'
You roll up your sleeves. Your friend nods, 'Okay, smart move. No swamp monster grabby hands today!'
You and your friend link arms. 'Together!' Your friend grins, 'Ultimate duo power!'
You cheer, 'We got this!' Your friend smiles, 'Okay, okay, let’s do it!'

title: 8 The Coming Storm
subtitle: Thunder rumbles as you grab a mysterious map… What now?

options.response: You puff out your chest, 'A little thunder never scared me!' Your friend smirks, 'Okay, hero mode.'
You look for cover. Your friend sighs, 'Yeah, I’d rather not be a human lightning rod…'
You pat your friend’s shoulder, 'We got this.' They take a deep breath. 'Okay… yeah, you’re right.'
You shrug, 'It’s just a free shower!' Your friend snorts, 'Alright, rain enthusiast.'

title: 9 The Cozy Cave
subtitle: The map leads to a cave to wait out the storm… How do you chill?

options.response: You stand at the entrance like a knight. Your friend laughs, 'Brave warrior of… cozy caves?'
You start telling an epic tale. Your friend leans in, 'Ooo, keep going!'
You stretch out on the ground. Your friend flops beside you, 'This is actually kinda nice.'
You pick up rocks and start stacking them. Your friend joins in, 'Cave rock art competition, let’s go!'

title: 10 The Rainbow Path Home
subtitle: The sun’s back, showing a rainbow path home… How do you feel?

options.response: You bounce ahead. Your friend grins, 'Guess we’re never going home, huh?'
You smile at your friend. 'Wouldn’t have done this without you.' They nod, 'Same, this was awesome.'
You wave the map, 'Dude, we have THE best story!' Your friend laughs, 'They won’t believe us!'
You take a deep breath, 'We actually did it.' Your friend grins, 'Heck yeah, we did!'
